<template>
  <canvas id="myCanvas"></canvas>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "MaskCanvas",
  data() {
    return {
      canvas: document.getElementById("myCanvas"),
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.canvas = document.getElementById("myCanvas");
    console.log(this.cancas);
  },
  methods: {},
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped>
